FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND EXHIBITS. &#160;&#160; &#160; 4 &#160; SIGNATURES &#160;&#160; &#160; 5 &#160; EXHIBIT 1.1 &#160;&#160; EXHIBIT 4.1 &#160;&#160; EXHIBIT 4.2 &#160;&#160; EXHIBIT 4.3 &#160;&#160; EXHIBIT 4.4 &#160;&#160; EXHIBIT 4.5 &#160;&#160; EXHIBIT 4.6 &#160;&#160; EXHIBIT 4.7 &#160;&#160; EXHIBIT 4.8 &#160;&#160; EXHIBIT 5.1 &#160;&#160; EXHIBIT 23.1 &#160;&#160; ITEM&#160;8.01. OTHER EVENTS. On April&#160;13, 2022, Amazon.com, Inc. (the &#8220;Company&#8221;) closed the sale of $1,500,000,000 aggregate principal amount of its 2.730% notes due 2024 (the &#8220;2024 Notes&#8221;), $1,500,000,000 aggregate principal amount of its 3.000% notes due 2025 (the &#8220;2025 Notes&#8221;), $2,000,000,000 aggregate principal amount of its 3.300% notes due 2027 (the &#8220;2027 Notes&#8221;), $1,500,000,000 aggregate principal amount of its 3.450% notes due 2029 (the &#8220;2029 Notes&#8221;), $2,500,000,000 aggregate principal amount of its 3.600% notes due 2032 (the &#8220;2032 Notes&#8221;), $2,500,000,000 aggregate principal amount of its 3.950% notes due 2052 (the &#8220;2052 Notes&#8221;), and $1,250,000,000 aggregate principal amount of its 4.100% notes due 2062 (the &#8220;2062 Notes&#8221; and, together with the 2024 Notes, 2025 Notes, 2027 Notes, 2029 Notes, 2032 Notes, and 2052 Notes, the &#8220;Notes&#8221;) pursuant to an Underwriting Agreement dated April&#160;11, 2022 (the &#8220;Underwriting Agreement&#8221;) among the Company and Goldman Sachs&#160;&amp; Co. LLC, J.P. Morgan Securities LLC, and Morgan Stanley&#160;&amp; Co. LLC, as managers of the several underwriters named in Schedule II therein. The sale of the Notes was registered under the Company&#8217;s registration statement on Form S-3 filed on June&#160;1, 2020 (File No.&#160;333-238831). The aggregate public offering price of the Notes was $12.719&#160;billion and the estimated net proceeds from the offering were approximately $12.692&#160;billion, after deducting underwriting discounts from the public offering price and before deducting offering expenses payable by us. The Notes were issued pursuant to an Indenture dated as of November&#160;29, 2012 (the &#8220;Base Indenture&#8221;) between the Company and Wells Fargo Bank, National Association, as trustee (the &#8220;Prior Trustee&#8221;), as amended and supplemented by Supplemental Indenture No.&#160;1 dated as of April&#160;13, 2022 (the &#8220;Supplemental Indenture&#8221;) among the Company, the Prior Trustee, as prior trustee, and Computershare Trust Company, National Association, as successor trustee (the &#8220;Trustee&#8221;), establishing the terms of each series of the Notes. The foregoing descriptions of the Underwriting Agreement and the Supplemental Indenture are qualified in their entirety by the terms of such agreements, which are filed as Exhibit 1.1 and Exhibit 4.1, respectively, and incorporated herein by reference. The foregoing description of the Notes is qualified in its entirety by reference to the full text of the form of 2024 Note, form of 2025 Note, form of 2027 Note, form of 2029 Note, form of 2032 Note, form of 2052 Note, and form of 2062 Note, which are filed hereto as Exhibit 4.2, Exhibit 4.3, Exhibit 4.4, Exhibit 4.5, Exhibit 4.6, Exhibit 4.7, and Exhibit 4.8, respectively, and incorporated herein by reference. ITEM&#160;9.01. FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND EXHIBITS. LLC, J.P. Morgan Securities LLC, and Morgan Stanley&#160;&amp; Co. LLC, as managers of the several underwriters named in Schedule II therein. 4.1 &#160;&#160; Supplemental Indenture, dated as of April&#160;13, 2022, among Amazon.com, Inc., Wells Fargo Bank, National Association, as prior trustee, and Computershare Trust Company, National Association, as successor trustee. 4.2 &#160;&#160; Form of 2.730% Note due 2024 (included in Exhibit 4.1). 4.3 &#160;&#160; Form of 3.000% Note due 2025 (included in Exhibit 4.1). 4.4 &#160;&#160; Form of 3.300% Note due 2027 (included in Exhibit 4.1). 4.5 &#160;&#160; Form of 3.450% Note due 2029 (included in Exhibit 4.1). 4.6 &#160;&#160; Form of 3.600% Note due 2032 (included in Exhibit 4.1). 4.7 &#160;&#160; Form of 3.950% Note due 2052 (included in Exhibit 4.1). 4.8 &#160;&#160; Form of 4.100% Note due 2062 (included in Exhibit 4.1). 5.1 &#160;&#160; Opinion of Gibson, Dunn&#160;&amp; Crutcher LLP. 23.1 &#160;&#160; Consent of Gibson, Dunn&#160;&amp; Crutcher LLP (included in Exhibit 5.1). 104 &#160;&#160; The cover page from this Current Report on Form 8-K, formatted in Inline XBRL (included as Exhibit 101).
